p: The anti-DENV IgM tests were performed with a commercial enzyme immunoassay (EIA) (Focus Technologies) following manufacturer's instructions. The anti-DENV IgGs were determined by an in-house immunofluorescence assay as previously described [23]. The tests were carried out as dilution series of 1∶10 to 1∶640, employing acetone-fixed DENV-3 infected Vero E6 cells as the antigen.
